body.name: Fantom Drives FD 2TB DVR Expander External Hard Drive - USB 3.0 & eSATA (Comes with Both USB and eSATA Cable) - Supports DirecTv, Dish, Motorola, Arris and More, Black (DVR2KEUB)

features: Please check compatibility chart below in "From the Manufacturer" section. Do not purchase unit if DVR model is not in the compatibility list.

Expand your DVR hard drive recording of up to 2,000 hours. Contact your cable box provider to make sure of its compatibility. Please contact your DVR/Cable provider to confirm external hard drive usage
Plug and play with DVR device. Connect your DVR device with our external hard Drive (eSATA Cable included)
Made with high quality aluminum for maximum reliability. Aluminum doubles as a heat sink to keep hard drive cool and quiet
Comes with easy to follow instructions, DVR Expander, stand, USB 3 0 cable, and eSATA cable
body.description: GFORCE DVR Expander provides additional storage to record endless hours of your favorite TV show and movies. Market tested and proven for reliability and quality, our DVR External Hard Drives are built with high quality aluminum and provides a sleek look to any entertainment center and room. Compatible with DirecTV HR20, HR21, HR23, HR24, HR34, HR44, HS17 | DISH Network VI 612, 622, 722, 722K, 211K, 922, Hopper, Wally | Motorola DCH3416, 6416, DCT3412, 3416, 6412, 6416, DCX3400, 3501, 3510, 3520e, DSR630, RNG200N, HDPVR630 | ARRIS MP522G, DCX3600, DCX3635 | Cisco 8640, 8642, 8650, 9865 | Moxi Moxi Only

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Sleek Sexy Aluminum Case Fantom Drives DVR Expander comes in a ultra sturdy and sleek aluminum design. Fanless design as the aluminum doubles as a heatsink. eSATA and USB Cable Included Our external hard drives for DVRs come with both eSATA to eSATA cable and USB 3.0 cable. Included is a stand to allow you to place your expander vertically or horizontally. Everything You Need Easy to read installation guide is included with all the necessary information you will need. Fast Speed With USB 3.0, have no issues watching or transferring shows with zero lag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great on my Directv box
reviews.reviewText: Very easy just plugged it into the Directv box with the included cable and it works. Nice product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Soooo glad I ordered this H/D. Had an appointment with Dish to replace my hopper 2000 with one that had sling and get the super joey also. Old hopper was 21% full took me 3 days to transfer the recordings at my leisure of course was in no hurry. When I first hooked it up according to the directions provided it did not show up or recognized by the hopper unit,used the e sata cable that was provided. I then unplugged it from surge protector then the power switch on back of unit disconnected the e says then used the USB cable plugged it back in flipped the power switch within 5 sec it was recognized and the hopper was ready to re format it. Just as easy to transfer recordings back to new hopper. Very chuffed with this little unit which btw seems to be built like a sh-- brick house a little heavy and nice aluminum outer case.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install on Dish system.
reviews.reviewText: Bought to use on Dish with hopper and Joeys. Works great. Had bought different hard drive offered by Dish on line. The dish hard drive failed after 13 months. The fandom appears to be much better quality and faster. It is a Seagate. The one Dish sells was a western. This one is also cheaper than one sold by dish. Can buy service to retrieve data if drive fails. Consider this, when my Dish hard drive failed I lost all movies on disk. Plug and play works great. Comes with own power supply so if U check Dish requirements for external hard Drive this qualifies. Comes with USB 3. works with USB 2.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great with my Dish Hopper w/sling DVR.
reviews.reviewText: I've been using the 2TB FD external hard drive for about two weeks and so far it works great!! It comes with instructions specifically for setting it up for Dish network products. I just followed the instructions exactly as written and have had NO problems. I have the older Dish w/Sling DVR and the External Hard Drive works great with my Hopper DVR. One important thing I did not know is that you do not have to transfer recordings back to you DVR in order to watch them. Simply go the External Hard Drive using your Dish remote, select a movie and play!!Lastly, if you are current Dish customer and have a Hopper DVR, then there is NO additional fee for this 2TB FD External Hard Drive. I called Dish and spoke with customer support just to be sure about it. Adding additional external storage is FREE.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not able to get working with my DISH Wally or my PC
reviews.reviewText: Seems solid. And Quiet. I really wanted this to work with my DISH Wally system in the RV. But it took a couple of weeks to get the DISH system working since the RV was stored in a place where I could not get the signal. I spent about 4 hours over 3 days with DISH tech support who walked me through reset of the system at least a dozen times. But the system will not recognize it. A now it's beyond the date when it could be returned to Amazon I thought I'd try a different disk, inexpensive Seagate from Costco. Worked the first time, and didn't need that extra power supply. Windows also does not recognize the drive. I think I have a boat anchor. Hard to recommend this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2019
reviews.reviewText: I have found Fantom to have some of the the most reliable drives that I have used. My oldest drive is a Fantom and it is still going strong while I have had others brands fail.. This Fantom Drive works great with my Dish Hopper 3. I plugged it in, turned it on, and the Hopper asked to format. It went through the format and the Hopper notified it was ready. The Hopper recognizes the drive as another playable source. You can transfer items from the Hopper 3 to this drive to open space on the Hopper 3. To play you hit additional sources on the new icon that displays after installing the drive and adding programs to the drive. The down side is when you are traveling you cannot access the add-on drive through the Dish Anywhere app. After speaking with a technical agent at Dish, I was advised that this may become an option in the near future. Other than that the playback is flawless. I would recommend especially if your Hopper 3 is getting pretty heavily loaded. The transfer from the Hopper 3 to the drive is pretty quick. Just a 2-3 minutes for a 1 hour HD show. The Hopper 3 has a USB 3.0 and a USB 2.0 receptacle in the back. I plugged this drive into the 3.0 as this drive is USB 3.0.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Must Have for DVRs
reviews.reviewText: I only write reviews if I have an exceptional experience or a terrible one. This falls in the category of the exceptional experience.I am using this with a DISH Hopper 3 with Sling. The setup was very easy. All I had to do was connect the USB cord to the DVR and this external drive, then restart my DVR. As soon as the DVR restarted, a setup guide appeared. No adapters or anything else is required other than what is in the box (USB and eSATA cables along with a stand). My DVR required the USB connection.All one has to do is format the friend and you are ready to go. The storage space is massive and the external drive is so quiet, it is barely heard. It is so easy to transfer files between the DVR and this external drive. Even the sort settings remain intact from the DVR to this drive.This is a must have if you want to expand your storage space. I plan to purchase one for use with my Windows desktop after seeing the performance with this product with my DVR.

I thought this product was extremely well designed, it is sleek and has a very nice finish, it came with all cords, they didn’t cheap out and make you purchase, the cord(s) you need! The instructions are simple to use. It runs quiet. The storage capacity was more than ample for my needs. Oh yea it even comes with a stand. All in all a high quality product!!!
It was real easy to set up and works great so far. A little noisy since it's always running, but other than that no issues.

reviews.reviewTitle: There may be some equipment reliability issues. :(
reviews.reviewText: Just from the outset I want to say this is NOT the review I wanted to write!The HDD came in good time, looks great, has a good instruction manual and has been thoughtfully packaged for folks who need an eSATA external HDD to expand their PVR capacity.It just would not work.The drive is recognised by my PVR as being there but that is all. When connected to a PC, it is not even recognized as connected.I am IT proficient and did some homework with my equipment (HDD and the PVR), unfortunately it remains a brick with a pretty blue light.Sorry folks, but based on my experiences I can't recommend this one. :(

reviews.reviewTitle: easy to use for my pvr
reviews.reviewText: bright solid or flashing blue light that is annoying.

Now I can keep recordings for a long time. The light is a bit bright but I put a small piece of electrical tape over it and the problem is solved. This is my second one (I have 2 DVRs) and the first one is still working after 3 or 4 years.
